name: The Approach
description:
Two survivors of a desolate apocalypse waste land. Only one keyboard. Only one key.

Your goal is to reach your opponent's side, stepping up in keys as your character does. 

If you get shot, you fall behind and lose your position.

Choose your opponent wisely for this two player game.

Man against man. Loved one against loved one. The winner takes all the supplies, the loser does the dishes.

HOW TO PLAY:

The player on the left starts at "z" and the player on the right starts at "/".  Hold your button to pop out from cover and release it to fire and return to cover.  If you hit the other player, your character and your corresponding position on the keyboard advance towards your opponent, if they hit you, you get pushed back. The goal is to get to your opponents start position and kill them. Press escape to open menu
